features: ANTI STATIC TECHNOLOGY: This pack of 80 dryer sheets from Raw Basics actively works to stop clothes clinging together; The secret is how our anti static dryer sheets release a fine layer of fabric softener, coating each garment individually; Experience smoother fabrics that cling less with our advanced non toxic dryer sheets

AMAZING SOFTNESS: Our fabric softener sheets leave remove that scratchy feeling from your clothes and linen; These laundry softener sheets contain cationic and nonionic types of softening agents that are non toxic and safe for sensitive skin; For cozy fabrics that feel great to touch, Raw Basics’ laundry dryer sheets are the answer

ZERO WASTE: Upgrade to fabric dryer sheets that are kind to the planet; Our drying sheets come packaged in unbleached cardboard that rapidly breaks down at the end of its lifetime; Better still, Raw Basics’ drying sheets laundry softener contain zero plastic packaging

INCREDIBLE FRESHNESS: People love the subtle scent of Raw Basics’ softener dryer sheets; Our premium scented dryer sheets feature the gentle aroma of a summer's day, without an overpowering smell; Keep your items smelling fresh and clean with these clever laundry fabric softener sheets from Raw Basics

LESS WRINKLES: Make wrinkles a thing of the past with fabric softener dryer sheets that actually work; These fabric dryer sheets help to eliminate creases and wrinkles from your items, helping to save time on ironing; Choose smarter with Raw Basics sensitive skin dryer sheets crafted to make your life easier

Up to 80 Loads Each box contains 80 scented dryer sheets, which is enough for up to 80 loads in both regular and heat pump dryers. Premium Softness Our dryer sheets also leave your clothes feeling soft to touch. What's more, these fabric softener sheets also stop items from clinging with static. Fresh Scent Our dryer sheets feature long lasting freshness without an overpowering aroma. These advanced dryer sheets have a pleasant and uplifting smell. Compact for Travel Pop a few dryer sheets in your luggage to keep your clothes smelling fresh on your next trip. Our sheets are lightweight, compact and ready to fly.

How do these sheets stop fabrics clinging? Our dryer sheets stop clothes clinging by coating the fibers with a thin layer of fabric softener. This coating neutralizes the static charge that builds up on clothes during the drying process, preventing them from sticking together. Can I use dryer sheets in a heat pump dryer? Yes. You can use dryer sheets in a heat pump dryer. However there are a few things to keep in mind. The sheets work best in heat pump dryers that have a reverse tumble feature. If you don't have reverse tumble, use two or three sheets per load. Are these unscented? No. Our dryer sheets feature a light, natural smelling scent with botanical aromas that won’t overpower you. Our dryer and fabric softener sheets have a long lasting perfume that’s subtle and fresh. How do these help reduce wrinkles? Dryer sheets reduce wrinkles in a few ways. They coat the fibers of the clothes with a thin layer of softener. They help to keep the clothes moist during the drying cycle and they can help to relax wrinkles that have already formed. Will these dryer sheets clog my lint filter? Slowly over time, your lint filter needs regular cleaning to remove buildup that may accumulate. For best results, clean the lint filter after every use and inspect the lint filter regularly for signs of residue buildup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not convinced that this is non-toxic.
reviews.reviewText: These dryer sheets from Raw Basics are a toughie to review properly. The listing cites that it contains both cationic and noninonic types of softening agents, that they claim is non-toxic. But, the most popular cationic ingredient is “Dialkylester dimethyl ammonium methosulfate” it’s essentially an ammonium salt that is used in many softeners for softening and anti-static. The problem is it’s also associated with respiratory irritation and there’s some other red flag health issues linked to it as well. Nowhere on the box is there a list of ingredients, and since it’s got cationic softener in this, I’m not convinced this is non-toxic. There needs to be ingredient transparency.This looks just like a bounce sheet, so I’m not convinced that the fibers are eco-friendly. The scent is powdery/outdoor fresh, and performance is just like the commercial dryer sheets I’ve used in the past. Not like the truly eco-friendly, non-toxic sheets that are out. Made in China.My take-a-way is that they’re trying to package this as an eco-friendly, non-toxic dryer sheet, but I’m not convinced that these are. Ingredient labeling and more discussion around their manufacturing practices are needed. HOW is their product non-toxic? What are they not adding?It looks like the one solid eco-friendly selling point is the packaging. It’s plastic free, and the cardboard box it comes in is un-bleached.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good scent. Works well enough.
reviews.reviewText: These dryer sheets work about as well as any other dryer sheet I’ve used. It added a little bit of extra scent to my laundry and got rid of any wrinkles my clothes may have had. I don’t have any clothes that wrinkle a lot so maybe I’m not the best test for that.
